item.title: Calculations With The Shape Operator
item.description: Let \Sigma be an orientable surface in \mathbb{R}^d. Then we can define a vector field n: \Sigma \to S^{d-1}.

item.title: Broad-Narrow Analysis
item.description: We aim to obtain a bound \| Ef \|_{L^p(B_R)} \lessapprox \| f \|_{L^p(\Sigma)} by using multilinear restriction estimates and decoupling estimates.

item.title: Restricted Decoupling + Kakeya Implies Restriction
item.description: Recall the The Refined Decoupling Theorem.

item.title: The Multilinear Restriction Conjecture
item.description: The restriction conjecture states that for 2d/(d-1) < q < \infty and 1 - \left( \frac{d+1}{d-1} \right) (1/q) \geq 1/p, \| Ef \|_{L^q(\mathbb{R}^d)} \lesssim \| f \|_{L^p(\Sigma)}.

item.title: Induction on Scales
item.description: Suppose C(R) is a finite quantity chosen for each integer R > 0, such that, by some (hopefully trivial) argument, we can justify C(R) = R^{O(1)}.

item.title: Wave Packet Decomposition For Extension
item.description: Given any function f supported on a compact neighborhood of a curved hypersurface \Sigma, and each R > 0, we can break \Sigma down finitely overlapping caps \Theta, each having dimensions R^{-1/2} tangent to \Sigma, and dimension R^{-1} in the normal direction to \Sigma.

item.title: Shadings
item.description: Suppose we have a family of subsets \mathbb{A} in \mathbb{R}^n, with |A| \sim V for each A \in \mathbb{A}.

item.title: The Kakeya Maximal Inequality
item.description: The Kakeya maximal conjecture states that for a family \mathbb{T} of \delta-tubes which are direction separated, then for 0 \leq d \leq n, \left\| \sum 1_T \right\|_{L^{\frac{d}{d-1}}(\mathbb{R}^n)} \lessapprox \delta^{1-n/d}.

item.title: We Can Remove Exceptional Sets From Lp Estimates
item.description: Suppose X_0 has finite measure, and we have to prove an inequality of the form \| f \|_{L^p(X_0)} \lesssim C.
